contentBlocks.title: General Spa Cover Requirements
paragraphs: Spa covers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa covers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa covers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa covers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa covers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa covers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa covers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa covers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa covers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa covers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa covers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa covers must be installed by a qualified person.
